english.segment1: Here I am once again. Pleading. To the sky. Kneeling to the sands shedding my. Regrets. Knowing You'll forget everything
english.segment2: (chorus). Why didn't I go to such great lengths to. Try to please You. Instead I tried to please myself. In the end when your heart is broken. I see the folly of trying to please myself
english.segment3: I have not yet arrived. Seeing. Anything. Quiet my desires till they die. Until they die. Or align with Your will
